config.name: Overview: Alert Status
config.content: Overall alert status of all currently monitored components of the Citrix XenApp application.

config.name: End-User Experience: Website Checks
config.content: Measure the entire performance and status of the web application from an external perspective - or from any installed LogicMonitor Collector.

config.name: Load Balancer: Citrix Netscaler
config.content: Citrix Netscaler acts as a load balancer and web application firewall in front of the XenApp farm, and is monitored through SNMP and SSH.

config.name: Application: Citrix XenApp/ XenDesktop
config.content: Citrix XenApp/ XenDesktop application service status and performance collected from the Delivery Controller via the OData API.

config.name: Web Server: Microsoft IIS
config.content: Web application service status and performance metrics collected from IIS using WMI.

config.name: Database: Microsoft SQL
config.content: Service status and performance collected from SQL using Perfmon or JDBC.

config.name: Operating System: Microsoft Windows
config.content: Operating system status and performance collected from Windows using Perfmon, PowerShell, or WMI.

config.name: Virtualization: VMware ESXi
config.content: Monitor the hypervisor itself alongside virtual machine status and performance data collected from ESXi using the VMware API.

config.name: Storage: Nimble Array
config.content: Monitor the SAN performance data collected from SNMP as well as using the Nimble API.

config.name: Network
config.content: Network data collected with SNMP,  Netflow and more. Overview graphs point out chatty devices in case they're affecting parts of the network.

config.name: Top Network Interfaces by Total Throughput
